title: PBE Account Logging in Issues
body:
Ok, So I applied for the PBE account. When i Click my PBE status, it says with a picture of Jayce
"Congratulations on being selected as a tester for this PBE cycle! As a tester, you'll..."
So I guess I was selected. But I forgot what account details I had added. I tried to recover my password and username, but whenever i Type my Email (the email associated with my main account) to recover my PBE username, its says "Account name has been sent to the specified Email address.".
But i Receive nothing. Yeah, so can anyone help? I waited a long time to get into the PBE, i really want access.
Note: I did change the email associated with my main account. Can that be a problem?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Changing the email shouldn't be a problem, as long as you still have access to it, which it sounds like you do. Would you mind shooting over a ticket to [player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look at your account and see why your credentials aren't working?

When you submit your ticket, please use the subject line "**Unrecoverable Account**" from the email address that you used to sign up for your account.
Use the email i used to sign up for the pbe account or my current email? in any case ill leave the info in mt description then.
Mmmm. I would go with the original email!
